title: The Amazon KDP Niche Research Method that Added 11,555 Book Sales...

tactics.name: bestseller_rank_scanning
tactics.description: Identify niches by scanning Amazon bestseller lists for low-review, high-potential categories while excluding major publishers.
steps: Access Amazon bestseller list via Amazon.com or Google
Ignore books from major publishers (e.g., Coco Wire, Jade Summer)
Scan for books with <100 reviews in top 100 BSR positions
caveats: May miss niche opportunities in highly saturated categories
source_quotes: we're going to scan through the listings and look for books that have less than 100 reviews

tactics.name: seasonal_niche_spin
tactics.description: Combine seasonal themes with existing niches to create unique products
caveats: Market saturation risk if multiple creators target same theme
source_quotes: monochrome flower coloring book is obviously monochrome with this kind of spring spin on it

tactics.name: cross_niche_analysis
tactics.description: Evaluate niche potential by comparing multiple categories
caveats: Requires time to analyze multiple categories
source_quotes: If you go down this rabbit hole, you're going to get stuck here and you're going to find a lot of fantastic niches

tactics.name: Scan for Low-Review Niche Books
tactics.description: Identify independently published books with low review counts and high BSR to find untapped niches.
steps: Filter books by review count and BSR
Focus on niche categories with identifiable target audiences
caveats: May fail if niche is oversaturated
source_quotes: Ideally, we just want to make the most of our time when we are researching.

tactics.name: trend-based niche research
tactics.description: Identify emerging trends on platforms like YouTube, validate with Amazon BSR and review data, then rapidly develop low-cost products.
steps: Monitor YouTube trends like Coco Wire
Validate niches using Amazon BSR and review counts
Incorporate QR codes for customer acquisition
caveats: Competition increases as methods become widespread
source_quotes: We published this as soon as we saw that this trend was taking off because we spent time on Amazon doing the research

heuristics.name: low_review_boost
source_quotes: we're going to scan through the listings and look for books that have less than 100 reviews

heuristics.name: low_review_niche_boost
heuristics.condition: If niche has fewer than 200 reviews, prioritize for content creation
source_quotes: If we were into the sketchbooks, we could go ahead. We could create content for this

heuristics.name: Review Count Threshold
source_quotes: Ideally, we just want to make the most of our time when we are researching.

heuristics.name: low-effort niche validation
source_quotes: production cost was not as good as it is now, but it was still relatively quick

claims.statement: Amazon's algorithm in 2026 can effectively find audiences without keyword optimization
source_quotes: In my opinion, you don't have to worry too much about keywords

claims.statement: AI content creation enables rapid development of niche products
source_quotes: With the use of AI, this is the single most powerful method...

claims.statement: Free strategy session available for seasonal book planning
source_quotes: Ray Dog seller room is going to be hosting a free session...

claims.statement: Independent authors can succeed in niches with low BSR and low review counts
source_quotes: This is making a ton of money basically.

claims.statement: The niche research method generated 11,555 paid copies across seven books in 2 years
source_quotes: we sold 11,555 paid copies as you can see across those books

niche_patterns.example: adult vintage fashion + coloring + low competition
niche_patterns.description: Target underserved niches with specific identity and constraint combinations
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines niche identity with low competition signals
source_quotes: this is a niche that still has potential in 2026
